title: Guidance TamilNadu

p.pt: ‘Guidance’ is the Government of Tamil Nadu’s nodal agency for investment promotion and single window facilitation. I contributed to the creation of their website from the ground up using the frontend tools I am familiar with.

During my time at Tata Consultancy Services, I was part of this project to develop a digital platform that would reduce the amount of paperwork and documentation required for investors to gain secure access to government services.

p1: ‘Guidance’ is the Government of Tamil Nadu’s nodal agency for investment promotion and single window facilitation. I contributed to the creation of their website from the ground up using the frontend tools I am familiar with.
p2: The purpose of this project is to develop a digital platform that reduces the amount of paperwork and documentation required to obtain government clearances, allowing investors to gain quick and secure access to government services.

title: Ecoflights

p.pt: To demonstrate my full stack skills, I created a project using React as the frontend, Express and Node as the backend, and MangoDB for databases.

p1: To demonstrate my full stack skills, I created a project using React as the frontend, Express and Node as the backend, and MangoDB for databases.
p2: The purpose of this project is to develop a digital platform that reduces the amount of paperwork and documentation required to obtain government clearances, allowing investors to gain quick and secure access to government services.

title: E-commerce

p.pt: ‘Through this project, I wanted to gain a better understanding of the react-redux concept by seeing how it works in practise.

p1: Through this project, I wanted to gain a better understanding of the react-redux concept by seeing how it works in practise.
